hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #4# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Morpha is easily trapped in a corner.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Boomerang#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #Goron City#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Strength Upgrade#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Map of the Water Temple#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Kakariko Bazaar#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
